TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
Creates a Light ritual circle, identifies Light magic, and serves as resurrection circle for followers of that Deity.
1/ever Spellstrike a significant amount of Light damage.
Dedicates a creature to the caster's deity and gives them a 1/day "Magic Bless".
Send a short message to your god, they might listen if they like you.
Augments Bless spells to grant an increased level of protection and more notice from your deity.
Augments your Church with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to the ability to give a Mass: Blessing in 5 minutes.
For a short time, Undead or Demons may not approach the caster without using spell defenses, the caster also glows really bright!
Can be used to create acidic holy water, protect your flock from possession, or heal the land from corruption.
Summon a Celestial being to do a task of 10 words or less.
Summons an indestructible shield with 2 Ritual-level Tooth for a Tooths, this is meant to be used in combat against a specific target.
Extends the duration of Light rituals by 3 months per stack, max 12 months.
Investees gain a 1/day "10 Light" packet that also heals them for the same amount when used.
The caster can sacrifice material wealth, an enemy of the faith, or themselves for increasingly strong buffs for their flock.
Once activated, for 1 hour all Light-based healing becomes Mending, and Light Bolt may be used on friendlies for 20 Mending as well.
Replaces Cleansing Light, may be cast on healthy targets to essentially grant them a Contingency Cleansing Light if they die.
Like the battle magic spell, except it affects all who hear it and do not have a Bless of the Caster's deity.
Augments your Church with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to expanding the boundaries of the Church.
So long as the caster remains audibly praying and on their knees, no attack of ritual level or lower may occur or target a being within 10ft.
Allows the caster to add the Ritual prefix to a single Light battle magic spell 1/day.
Ask your Deity 3 questions, or request a miracle.
Investees can perform a 10-minute mass to grant up to five followers a flag that grants a +0 Magic threshold for 10 minutes.
The target takes some Light damage initially, which repeats if they use a spell or ritual from Dark, Draconic, Wytchcraft, or Necromancy.
The caster chooses an Acolyte, they can share in 1 self-cast battle magic spell per day and gain 1 Light battle magic spell per day, which the caster loses.
Enchants a weapon to swing Magic for a day, gain temp body for demons and undead killed, and also grants 1 Spellstrike Light Bolt.
Aura that sits on your spirit, when activated you swing +1 Light for an hour.
Cleanse a Dark/Draconic magic item and turn it into something more suitable for a Light worshiper.
Yell and destroy a bunch of Lesser Undead/Demons.
Augments your Church with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to 3/day Magic Cleanse if you drink the water.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Light rituals.
Plant your feet and throw 10 Light until you move, get dropped, or are dispelled.
1/day Ritual Divine Ward on the circle, note this is 1 per circle, not 1 per investee.
Teleport to the Divine Realm, then back to your Light ritual circle.
Light-based armour that lasts for 1 hour and comes with a bunch of abilities, such as a "2/ever Tooth for a Tooth".
Light-based armour that lasts for 1 hour and comes with a bunch of abilities, such as a 1/ever Light carrier to a single swing or tagged skill.
Light-based armour that lasts for 1 hour and comes with a bunch of abilities, such as a 1/ever Magic Paralyze.
Augments your Church with 5 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to 1/day PWD Ritual Paralyze to a target in your Church.
Turns 1/ever Light ritual effects into 1/day effects.
1/ever Ritual Sense Undead/Demon, and a PWD that severely weakens a creature that answers yes to that, comes with an echo.
Stops any single packet-delivered, boffer, or touch attack. You can only have one.
Does a bunch of magic body damage in a massive area and affects fellow worshipers with a Recover, but the caster immediately dies.
Keeps a badass enchanted weapon that anyone can use mounted in the circle, you can break it out for an hour for emergencies.
Begins the process of making an exceptionally powerful Relic enchanted with Light magic.
This Angel is bigger than the last one.
Turns a Light ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
Plant your feet and 1/ever 10 seconds the caster can use one of 5 abilities, including but not limited to Ritual Light Bolt.
Creates a tunnel of light magic that phases out other barriers both magical and physical, really hurts those without the right Bless.
Power Word Area: Destroy Lesser Undead and Demons
